content.raw:
The test segfaults for me:

~~~
louise@louise-nooto:~/code/gazebo/build$ ./test/integration/INTEGRATION_nested_model 
[==========] Running 2 tests from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 2 tests from PhysicsEngines/PhysicsMsgsTest
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/PhysicsMsgsTest.LoadNestedModel/0
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 10.0.0.174
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:169] ServerFixture load in 0.9 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:118] ServerFixture::Unload
[       OK ] PhysicsEngines/PhysicsMsgsTest.LoadNestedModel/0 (1051 ms)
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/PhysicsMsgsTest.SpawnNestedModel/0
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 10.0.0.174
Segmentation fault (core dumped)
~~~
